title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4204.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4204.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to provide guidance to industrial
firms wishing to obtain industrial effectiveness assistance in the form of a
productivity assessment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4204.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
